title: Speed Increased
content:
Speed Increased The distance you can move per turn is increased by 3m.

The distance you can move per turn is increased by 3m.

Speed Increased is a Class Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Speed Increased is represented not only in movement, but also in preventing Opportunity Attacks from targets. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or pieces of Armor with Proficiency,
